import {useState} from 'react' const Nav = (props) => { const [state, setState] = useState({ active: 'home', host: 'http://localhost:3000/', }) const {active, localhost, host} = state const executeScroll = (e) => { setState({...state, active: e.target.textContent.toLowerCase()}) } return (
SPMAnalyzer
Home Features Gallery SPM Estimator Contact Download
) } export default Nav
